Configures the CSP (Content Security Policy) settings for the current portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"domains":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The collection of allowed domains in the Content Security Policy (CSP).","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring the Content Security Policy (CSP) settings.","title":"CspRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
